nodes.text: Timeline 18: The Force War on Tython

Timeline 18: The Force War on Tython would have been the eighteenth in the series of in-universe videos, providing backstory for the Star Wars: The Old Republic video game. The video would have been presented in the form of a record entry made in the Jedi Archives by Jedi Master Gnost-Dural.
The remaining Timeline videos were discontinued in early 2011, as the content was growing less relevant to the game.
Several Tythonian[sic] scholars began to use their knowledge of the Force to pursue power. A conflict ensued which destroyed Tython.
